last_episode_to_air.overview: Antoine says his farewells to Maryse and Lac-Sabin. When his replacement arrives– he isn’t as universally welcomed. Danahée inspires Mayor Toussaint to organize a memorial for the village.
last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6

name: Après
overview: After an unexpected tragedy rocks the small village of Lac-Sabin, its victims and survivors are forced to navigate their new reality. WARNING: Contains graphic gun violence and disturbing images.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Moments after an incomprehensibly traumatic and violent act, the village of Lac-Sabin is left in havoc. Grocery manager Maryse tries to establish order throughout the erupting chaos. WARNING: Contains graphic gun violence and disturbing images.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Media and police descend on Lac-Sabin. A special crisis social worker, Antoine is sent to help the villagers. Maryse is questioned repeatedly by police, forcing her to relive her account of the attack.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: A week after the event, Antoine gives Maryse’s fragile, naive daughter, Danahée, who has Down’s Syndrome extra attention in helping her navigate her panic attacks as a result of the violent attack.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Secrets come to the surface as certain villagers’ names are implicated in the violent attack. Maryse has a plan to rebuild Lac-Sabin, and everyone is starting to see that Antoine’s stabilization efforts are providing relief.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: The village of Lac-Sabin unites behind Maryse’s plan. Meanwhile, Simone, the only daughter of the town’s “Cursed Couple” wrestles inner demons when faced with the ultimate betrayal by her father.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Antoine says his farewells to Maryse and Lac-Sabin. When his replacement arrives– he isn’t as universally welcomed. Danahée inspires Mayor Toussaint to organize a memorial for the village.
